import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; import "./style/spanduk.css"; import About from "./about"; export default function List() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetchProducts(); }); const fetchProducts = async () => { await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/products`).then(({ data }) => { setProducts(data); }); }; return (

{products.length > 0 && products.map((row, key) => (

{row.title}

{row.description}
))}
); }
